metadata.title: CVE-2023-4579 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description: Search queries in the default search engine could appear to have been thecurrently navigated URL if the search query itself was a well formed URL.This could have led to a site spoofing another if it had been maliciouslyset as the default search engine. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 117.

criterions.comment: firefox package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
thunderbird package in jammy is affected and needs fixing.
mozjs78 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs91 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
mozjs102 package in jammy is affected and may need fixing.
